text: Son Hyun-woo, (Korean: 손|현|우, born on July 30, 1996) is a South Korean musician, actor and model, He is best known for his role as Im Han-tae in the BL series in "Sing My Crush" (2023), Heli in "Raseuteu Taeksi" (2023) and Kim Joon-soo in "Trap" (2020).https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%86%90%ED%98%84%EC%9A%B0 ==Career== He is an under in YKG Plus and won in Landing Award at the '2017 Supermodel Selection Contest'. He made also his debut as an actor with the web drama of 'Love Room Guest' and made a successful leap as an actor, In 2023 he is popularly for his role in Sing My Crush alongside with Jang Doyoon.https://www.koreandrama.org/person/son-hyun-woo-profile ==Filmography== ===Television=== Year Title Role 2023 Moon in the Day Seong Chan / Prince Ho Dong (Support Role) Sing My Crush Im Han Tae (Main Role) Last Taxi Heli (Main Role) 2022 Dear X Who Doesn't Love Me Kim Gang Wook (Support Role) 2020 Trap Kim Joon Su (Main Role) 2018 Mood Maker Himself (Support Role) Not Alright, But It's Alright Kim Ji Seok [Ji An's brother] (Support Role) Room of Romance Son Hyun Woo (Main Role) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Korean people Category:Korean actors Category:Korean musicians Category:People from Busan
title: Son Hyun-woo
